availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles S. Barry (Louisville, Kentucky, merchant and grocer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant and grocer. New York native. Married to Johanna C. Thompson Barry in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1862. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Liquor merchant in Louisville in 1862. Grocer in Louisville in 1863. Resident of Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 247A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482709.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 11, Jefferson County, Kentucky, 1862.
"Explosion of Gunpowder," The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, KY), January 15, 1863, p. 1.
"The Draft Progressing," The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, KY), May 12, 1864, p. 1.
